sentences.en: "I want to go with you, Daddy."—"Now, now, sweetheart."
sentences.cn: “爸爸，我想和你一起去。”——“好吧，好吧，小宝贝。”

sentences.en: Actor John Goodman played Melanie Griffith's sugar daddy in the film.
sentences.cn: 影片中约翰·古德曼饰演梅兰尼·格利菲斯的甜爹。

sentences.en: Daddy called and asked me to drop by his office.
sentences.cn: 爸爸打来电话让我去他办公室一趟。

sentences.en: Daddy was trembling with anxiety as to how the talks would go.
sentences.cn: 爸爸为那些商谈的进展而焦虑不安.

sentences.en: Daddy, can I have some money?
sentences.cn: 爸, 能给我点钱 吗 ?

sentences.en: Go and get your daddy for me.
sentences.cn: 去把你爸爸给我叫过来。

sentences.en: I had warned the children that daddy was on the warpath.
sentences.cn: 我警告过孩子们爸爸就要大发雷霆了。

sentences.en: I wrote a letter to Daddy.
She wanted her mummy and daddy.
sentences.cn: 她想要她的妈妈和爸爸。

sentences.en: They hit it off straight away, Daddy and Walter.
sentences.cn: 爸爸和沃尔特很快就一见如故。

sentences.en: Was your daddy heartbroken when they got a divorce?
sentences.cn: 他们离婚时你爸爸是不是很伤心？

sentences.en: What does your daddy look like?
Why didn't Daddy let me keep the ten dollars?
sentences.cn: 爸爸为什么不让我留下这十美元?

phrases.tran_cn: [俚]同类中最大；最重要的人；最重要的物
[美俚]甜爹（施恩或送贵重礼品以博取年轻女人欢心的老色迷）

trans.tran_en: father – used especially by children or when speaking to children
